chember.title: ChEmber
chember.subtitle: Winter Projects Initiative
chember.description: Ignite your passion for chemical engineering this winter! ChEmber (Chemical Engineering + Ember) is a project initiative focused on sparking innovation during the semester break.

projects.title: Biorefinery Process Development
projects.description: Design sustainable biomass conversion technologies for renewable chemicals and fuels production.

projects.title: Carbon Capture Technology
projects.description: Develop industrial-scale carbon capture systems using novel absorption materials.

projects.title: Polymer Membrane Technology
projects.description: Research advanced membranes for water purification and gas separation applications.

projects.title: Catalytic Reactor Design
projects.description: Optimize heterogeneous catalytic reactors for petrochemical processes.

projects.title: Process Safety Analysis
projects.description: Conduct hazard analysis and risk assessment for chemical manufacturing plants.

checlipse.title: ChEclipse
checlipse.subtitle: Summer Research Initiative
checlipse.description: Uncover new ideas this summer with ChEclipse (Chemical + Eclipse), a project initiative that brings light to challenging engineering problems.

projects.title: Solar Chemical Reactor Optimization
projects.description: Optimize solar thermal reactors for photocatalytic water splitting and hydrogen production.

projects.title: Green Chemistry Synthesis
projects.description: Develop environmentally friendly synthetic routes for pharmaceutical intermediates.

projects.title: Battery Material Testing
projects.description: Test and characterize novel battery materials for energy storage systems.

projects.title: Distillation Column Optimization
projects.description: Design and optimize multi-component distillation systems for chemical separations.

projects.title: Pharmaceutical Crystallization
projects.description: Study crystallization processes for pharmaceutical drug manufacturing and purification.

winter.title: Winter Projects 2025
winter.subtitle: More Exciting Projects Coming Soon!
winter.description: Stay tuned for our upcoming winter project initiatives. We're preparing innovative chemical engineering challenges for the winter semester.

summer.title: Summer Projects 2026
summer.subtitle: More Exciting Projects Coming Soon!
summer.description: Get ready for our next summer research initiatives. We're developing cutting-edge projects for the upcoming summer season.
